description: Needing a secluded place for a late-night tryst, two couples stow away in a mall after hours, but are quickly ensnared in a gruesome and deadly game.
actors: Ranodeep Bose, Soumendra Bhattacharya, Subholina Sen, Ananya Biswas

title: Lunch Time Heroes
description: Assigned to teach a class of unruly high schoolers, a devoted young woman soon comes to find common ground with the kids, who seek only acceptance.
actors: Diana Yekinni, Dakore Akande, Odenike Odetola, Ijeoma Aniebo

title: Lupin the 3rd: The Castle of Cagliostro: Special Edition
description: Lupin, his sidekick Jigen and the samurai warrior Goemon set out to take over an evil counterfeit operation at Count Cagliostro's fortress.
actors: Yasuo Yamada, Kiyoshi Kobayashi, Eiko Masuyama, Makio Inoue

title: Lusers
description: Three men from different nations must find their way out of the Amazon jungle -- on foot -- when they get lost on the way to Brazil's World Cup Final.
actors: Carlos Alcántara, Pablo Granados, Felipe Izquierdo, Gaby Espino

title: Lust Stories
description: In the companion to 2013's "Bombay Talkies," four short films by four of India's biggest directors explore love, sex and relationships in modern India.
actors: Vicky Kaushal, Bhumi Pednekar, Radhika Apte, Neha Dhupia

title: LuTo
description: After falling deeply in love, young couple Luisa and Tomás suffer a blow that could destroy the very foundation of their relationship.

title: Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana
description: Fleeing London to evade a gangland debt collector, Omi Khurana returns to his native village in India, passing himself off as a successful lawyer.
